short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically clicks the 'Verify' button on Okta.com when prompt for the custom IdP Factor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Infinipoint helper extension to automatically click the 'Verify' button on Okta logins when prompting for the custom IdP Factor.
